attributes.action: Install suicide barriers along the length of the Kessock Bridge.
attributes.additional_details: To help with the rise of suicide attempts on the bridge & possibly save lives.
attributes.background: To look into installing suicide barriers along the full length of the Kessock Bridge due to the rise of suicide attempts.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Major roads in Scotland are a matter for the Scottish Government via Transport Scotland

That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

https://petitions.parliament.scot/
